column1: NGR is to the west of Barbrook Reservoir on Big Moor at the stated altitude. The 1950s record has an NGR, SK280770, in the reservoir! The relationship to church and station imply the gauge is west of the reservoir, based on as the crow flies distances; the long/lat on the 1920s record places the gauge east of the reservoir, which is more accessible. The descriptions state the gauge in in open moorland and no point is the reservoir mentioned. NGR could be +/- 200m or even up to 1km East.
Feb and Mar 1947 noted as being corrected for snow but left in this record.
